title: Mod Monkey Girl (Green Polka Dots) Edible Cake Topper Decoration
features: Easy to Use; Instructions on How to Apply Topper Included
Edible Image Made Out of Sugar; One Time Use
Fits on 8" to 10" cakes or can be centered on 1/4 sheet cake
description: Edible cake toppers are a creative, fun way to personalize your homemade or bakery style cakes. The toppers is round (7" in diameter) and fits nicely on 8" to 10" cakes or can be centered on 1/4 sheet cake. The edible toppers are printed with edible food coloring ink on edible frosting sheet. Edible toppers are best when applied to royal icing, buttercream, fondant, or even store bought icing. Just remove the protective backing and you are ready to go! We include instructions on how to apply the edible topper as well as how to store the topper until your event. See our FAQs and shipping policies for production and shipping times.
